title: Inclusive Luxury Spa Resort | Life in Balance | Miraval Resorts
description: Explore the various Miraval spa treatments and amenities, including pools, available at the Life in Balance Spa in Texas, Arizona, Massachusetts, and the new Miraval Life in Balance Spa Aviara in Carlsbad, California.
cleaned_text: Life in Balance Spas Life-enhancing minimalism. That's the philosophy of the designers behind our three spas—and you can see it, smell it, and most importantly feel it, the moment you step into each serene space. Welcome to Life in Balance. Miraval Resorts & Spas, a global leader in wellness destinations, plans to bring its world-renowned Miraval Life in Balance Spa concept to Southern California at Park Hyatt Aviara Resort in 2023. [READ MORE- Link opens in a new window](https://parkhyattaviara.com/miravalspa/) Exclusive Spa Services Enter a portal to bliss at the award-winning Life in Balance Spa, where innovation meets tradition to honor nature, nurture the body, and refresh the soul. Vasudhara Naga Obsidian & Sage Cara Vida Heart Song Yojana: Union Between Spirits Three Distinct Locations Though all three share the same spirit and philosophy, each of our locations celebrates what is elemental where they are—the natural environment, its energy, and the area's native plants and botanicals. At Life in Balance Spas, Clodagh's "Four C" approach to design (Contemplate, Cleanse, Clarify, Create) is infused into every aspect of the space, exuding luxury without being lavish.
